name: bernarda
message:
Happy CFS/ME/FMS day to you too. Ask your wife to try and eliminate all the purines in her diet. This is part of the FMS presentation [as i have it] and reduces pain and fatigue caused after eating any foods with purines in them.

Love the blue hair. Your an angel for your love and support. So much criticism and prejudice abounds with these conditions, that it is refreshing to see how much you love your wife who is ill.
